byline.contributor: David Jolly reported from Paris, and Neil Gough from Hong Kong. Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.
byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and NEIL GOUGH

lead_paragraph: A standoff between Greece and its European lenders appeared to reach a new low, causing stocks in Japan and Australia to drop on Tuesday.

headline.main: European Stocks Shrug Off Faltering Talks on Greek Debt
headline.print_headline: European Stocks Shrug Off Faltering Talks on Greek Debt

snippet: A standoff between Greece and its European lenders appeared to reach a new low, causing stocks in Japan and Australia to drop on Tuesday.
